thread.title: Peter, NSW Mid North Coast
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Peter, NSW Mid North Coast

author: Peter, NSW Mid North Coast
title: Peter, NSW Mid North Coast
text:
The Solar Quote: s website is a brilliant resource that explained the basic stuff but let me drill down into the detail where I needed (or wanted!) to.
I felt it only fair to use the 'request a Quote: ' service as repayment for the free education I received.
The first company called me less than 10 minutes after I requested the Quote: online at Solar Quote: s, arranged an onsite visit the next morning and gave me a Quote: on the spot with options .
The 2nd called me 20 minutes after the first company, spent time understanding our situation and needs and sent me a Quote: promptly again with different options.
The 3rd sent me a generic flyer with the promise of a phone call which didn't ever happen - that's the only reason why Solar Quote: s didn't get 5 stars!
The knowledge I gained from Solar Quote: s equipped me to ask the right questions and provided the resources to research the systems I was Quote: d on. I couldn't have asked for more.
